item.title: EP 83 - The Real Life Infinity Gauntlet: The Hand Of Glory
item.itunes:title: The Real Life Infinity Gauntlet: The Hand Of Glory
item.description:
Every night, a single mom in Britain puts her children to sleep. But when it comes time for her to fall asleep, a chilling song fills the air. Over the course of months, the mother tries to keep her sanity and find the source of haunting tune.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Then we travel to Sweden and back in time to take a look at the case of the Atlas Vampire. When a young prostitute is murdered and her body is drained of blood, it is up to the Swedish police to catch the cold-blooded killer.

And finally we take a look at “The Hand Of Glory.” This hand-made relic (pun intended) would bestow the holder with powers only a thief would love: You can unlock any door and freeze your victims in place. For 200 years in Europe, Hands Of Glory were a much sought after item for the criminal class. So home owners had to come up with their own spells to fight back . . .

Links:

Spiders blamed after broken siren played creepy nursery rhymes randomly at night to UK townsfolk

https://boingboing.net/2018/09/17/spiders-blamed-after-broken-si.html

Atlas Vampire

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atlas_Vampire

10 Disturbing Facts Of The Atlas Vampire

http://listverse.com/2018/08/12/10-disturbing-facts-of-the-atlas-vampire/

Sweden's Most Bizarre Unsolved Murder Was (Maybe) Committed By A Vampire

https://gizmodo.com/swedens-most-bizarre-unsolved-murder-was-maybe-commit-1706115395

Mummified Hand from Yorkshire May Be Last Hand of Glory Still in Existence

https://www.ancient-origins.net/news-history-archaeology/mummified-hand-yorkshire-may-be-last-hand-glory-still-existence-004457

Hand of Glory

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hand_of_Glory

The Hand of Glory

http://myths.e2bn.org/mythsandlegends/origins15607-the-hand-of-glory.html

Hand of Glory: The Macabre Magic of Severed Hands

https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/morbid-monday-severed-hands

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2021
